top_comments.comment: Want THREE (3) Masters booster boxes (2015, 2017, and Ultimate)? It's the Triple Masters giveaway! Just donate in multiples of $4.00 to Trans Lifeline below and I will send one donor ALL THREE boxes on Oct 30 at 6pm PST! I'll mail worldwide! But there's also 45 additional MTG prizes going out to 45 additional donors! You can see the full list here: https://twitter.com/TolarianCollege/status/1454226004130426884?s=20 and you just need to donate in $4 multiples. Each $4 is another chance to get a cool prize! Donate---> https://secure.givelively.org/donate/trans-lifeline/tolarian-community-college-1

comments_since_last_sample.body: ok but how is Morph kicker?
Since Zorn's (AFR) flavor text reads 'Zorns are native to the Elemental Plane of Earth' does that mean Earth is now part of the MTG universe?
It's like how every yugioh mechanic is just a different color of tribute summoning
For the professor, I couldn’t help but ask for the pun at the end of “if you don’t knock it off I’m going to kicker you out” to “if you don’t kick off I’m going to kicker you”

And all taxes are the government stealing from you!

See, everything is simple when you remove all the complexity

cleave is almost like kicker but with less text and the small differnce  that it's not an additional cost but an alternative casting cost. So if a card says you can cast a spell without paying it's mana cost you can do kicker (because kicker is an additional cost) but you can't do cleave.
I want to see him explain Banding.

Wait have I been playing verazol wrong. I can play more cards with effects and then copy them.





P.s sarcasm
